name: SheepDogInc.ca
tag_list: cloud-computing, google-apps, google-app-engine, software-development, web-development, consulting, analytics
overview:
SheepDogInc.ca is Canada’s leading Google Apps Authorized Reseller and full service application development firm.

As one of Google’s first certified channel partners for Google Apps, SheepDog has guided numerous enterprise and higher education clients through the transition to Google Apps since 2007. Expert in managing change throughout the deployment and migration process, SheepDog has worked with clients ranging from 50 to 6,000+ seats.

SheepDog’s in-house application development group specializes in web and mobile web applications deployed on cloud infrastructure including Google App Engine Amazon Web Services. The team employs an agile methodology and highly collaborative end-to-end engagement model that includes initial discovery, design, iterative development cycles, managed deployment and ongoing support and maintenance. In addition to serving traditional enterprise clients, SheepDog has carved out a niche helping resource constrained software startups complete non-core development projects.
